review: I was leary about ordering it.  I was very upset at the lag in delivery time.  Then I got it.  Set up right away.  So easy.  Works great.  Worth the wait and worth every penny if you have a Prime account, (which I originally got solely for the shipping).  Simple to use, better than Comcast Xfinity for watching TV shows by a mile.
